diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Familial Nephropathy and Multiple Exostoses with EXT1 Gene Mutation
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with nephrotic syndrome, a strong family history of renal disease and hearing impairment, and a renal biopsy demonstrated characteristic changes with glomerular deposition of fibrillar collagen. The EXT1 gene mutation was identified, and steroid-sensitive nephrotic syndrome was linked to abnormalities in the glomerular basement membrane.
